definitions.definition: the action or process of observing something or someone carefully or in order to gain information.
examples: she was brought into the hospital for observation
synonyms: review "the patient has been brought in for observation"

definitions.definition: the ability to notice things, especially significant details.
the taking of the altitude of the sun or another celestial body for navigational purposes.
a remark, statement, or comment based on something one has seen, heard, or noticed.
examples: he made a telling observation about Hugh
synonyms: reflection; obiter dictum "who was the recipient of that flattering observation?"
